thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Tim Ware
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Tim Ware

author: Tim Ware
title: Tim Ware
text: Courteous and efficient hand-over of the rental car at Christchurch Airport. The car, a Nissan Tiida, at budget rate (46,000 kms on the clock) was in excellent condition and clean, and it performed excellently, meeting our requirements perfectly. No difficulty encountered in extending the rental period by 12 hours. Efficient re-delivery service at Auckland Airport.
